title: Rug Sample, "Mola: "Nixon"", 20th century
description: Panel in reverse applique. Yellow backing, red top layer, middle layer shows through in black, pink, green, blue purple, etc. Central picture enclosed in a tooth-edged oval shows a stylized human figure standing with one arm raised and holding on  to microphone (?) Misc. letters: - "Dick Nisn" and "U.S." Accross to is "?", and "Welcomes". Top side motifs: styled human heads with eye-glasses, neckties and black stripe across forehead and down nose. Bottom motifs: geometric shapes and human head with earphone (?).

tombstone.epitaph:
Rug Sample, "Mola: "Nixon"", 20th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: applique. 1968-108-1-a.
